prompts: Create an electric-type Pokemon with a fluffy tail and big ears that spark with energy.
Imagine a Pokemon that combines the elegance of a deer with the electric power of Ampharos.
Design a bipedal Pokemon that glows in the dark and has a lightning bolt-shaped tail.
Show me a Pokemon that has an adorable face and can emit electric shocks to protect itself.
Generate a Pokemon resembling a fluffy sheep that can generate electricity from its wool.
Make a Pokemon that has a bright yellow body with a white underbelly and red accents.
Give me a quirky electric Pokemon that loves to play in forests and fields during thunderstorms.
